title: PBE CLIENT STUCK AT 75% APPLYING PATCHES
body: After downloading the pbe client on my mac its intaslling the files but its stuck on 75% and it says applying patches and it does not move ive tried everything and ive also tried leaving it for 3 hours and its stuck pls help

replies.body: Unfortunately, when it comes to the PBE, we can't offer any direct troubleshooting assistance.  This is because on the PBE, things are supposed to break and not work correctly so we can identify them and fix them when we release the latest patch live.  Given the issue, you may want to try [some of these steps ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#section-mac)to see if it helps!
mines stuck at 47% applying patches...any fix?
